data.name: RPG Maker MZ - EVFX Sanctuary
data.detailed_description:
“EVFX”, short for "Evolved Effects", is the successor to the acclaimed "Animations Collection" and "Animations Select" series of special effect animations developed by Dreams Circle. The EVFX series is made specifically for the RPG Maker MZ game engine and comes with sound effects perfectly engineered to match each animation.

"EVFX Sanctuary" features 20 gorgeous visual effects AND complementary sound effects, allowing you to add that professional polish to your projects easier than ever before and awe your audience!

Features:

* 20 Effekseer Animations (.efkefc)
* 20 Complementary Sound Effects (.ogg)
* RPG Maker MZ Demo Project

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games


System Requirements:

Having less than the requirements may result in slower/lagging animation playback and/or other performance issues.

WINDOWS:

OS: Microsoft Windows® 8.1/10 (64bit)
Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
Memory: 8 GB RAM
Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better

MAC:

OS: Mac OS 10.13 or better
Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
Memory: 8 GB RAM
Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
